mapper.select: SELECT constract_no, constract_type, deposit, m_rent, pay_type, imchain_name, imchain_phone, imchain_account, imdaein_account, constract_date, exp_date, constract_state, m_rent_date, memo, room_id FROM constract_info WHERE imchain_phone = #{imchainId}

SELECT constract_no, constract_type, deposit, m_rent, pay_type, imchain_name, imchain_account, imdaein_account, constract_date, exp_date, constract_state, constract_file, m_rent_date, memo, room_id FROM constract_info WHERE constract_no = #{constractNo}
